reviewText:
Dead by Dawn goes up and down, but is distressingly intolerable; after you have invested 2 hours of your life on it, it takes a nose dive into absolute nonsense.

I think this was meant to be or should have been serio-comic slasher, but most of the "murders by the vengeful soul" scenes were consigned to the cutting room floor with the consequence of a very unbalanced and too cliched effort.
